library.Book

    • Uses of Book in library

      Methods in library that return Book 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Book[] Library.getBooks()
      Method to retrieve the books array.
      Methods in library with parameters of type Book 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Library.add(Book book)
      Adds Book to the book bag
      boolean Library.checkOut(Book book)
      Checks if the book has been checked out by a user or not.
      boolean Library.remove(Book book)
      Removes the book from the book bag (array)
      boolean Library.returns(Book book)
      Allows user to return a book that they have rented.

      Method to set the books array equal to a value.
